text: @AmbJohnBolton @JohnCornyn @WHO @marcorubio @tedcruz Donald started it all: "...months before Covid-19 discovery, Trump axed a $200million early warning program for training scientists, led by Dr Linda Quick in China, & around the world detect viruses that could spread from animals to humans & cause the next global pandemic..."
